ALLOW_EXCL.description: Set this to True if you want ! to be a command prefix along with /

BAN_STICKER.description: ID of the sticker you want to use when banning people. Watch Video (check out Redme.md)

DEL_CMDS.description: Set this to True if you want to delete command messages from users who don't have the perms to run that command.

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables.

SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI.description: Your postgres sql db, empty this field if you dont have one. Watch Video (check out Redme.md)

OWNER_ID.description: Your user ID as an integer.

DEV_USERS.description: ID of users who are Dev (can use /py etc.)

GBAN_LOGS.description: Gban log channel, include the hyphen too: ex: -123456

TIME_API_KEY.description: Required for timezone information Watch Video (check out Redme.md)

API_OPENWEATHER.description: Required for weather information Watch Video (check out Redme.md)

PORT.description: Port to use for your webhooks.

STRICT_GBAN.description: Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.

SUDO_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as sudo users.

TIGER_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you wanna assign as tiger users.

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks.

WHITELIST_USERS.description: A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as whitelisted - can't be banned with your bot.

CHANNELS.description: Username or ID of channel or group. Separate multiple IDs by space.

ADMINS.description: Username or ID of Admin. Separate multiple Admins by space.

AUTH_USERS.description:
Username or ID of users to give access of inline search. Separate multiple users by space.
Leave it empty if you don't want to restrict bot usage.

AUTH_CHANNEL.description: ID of channel.Make sure bot is admin in this channel. Without subscribing this channel users cannot use bot.

START_MSG.value:
**Hi, I'm [Media Search Bot](https://github.com/subinps/Media-Search-bot) or you can call me as Auto-Filter Bot**

Here you can search files in Inline mode as well as PM, Use the below buttons to search files or send me the name of file to search.

USE_CAPTION_FILTER.description: Whether bot should use captions to improve search results. (True False)

OMDB_API_KEY.description: Your OMBD API KEY, Fill if you want to generate a imdb poster of movie in autofilter.

CUSTOM_FILE_CAPTION.description: A custom file caption for your files. formatable with , file_name, file_caption, file_size, Read Readme.md for better understanding.

AUTH_GROUPS.description: ID of groups which bot should work as autofilter, bot can only work in thease groups. If not given , bot can be used in any group.

DATABASE_URI.description: mongoDB URI. Get this value from https://www.mongodb.com. For more help watch this video - https://youtu.be/dsuTn4qV2GA

DATABASE_NAME.description: Name of the database in mongoDB. For more help watch this video - https://youtu.be/dsuTn4qV2GA

COLLECTION_NAME.description: Name of the collections. Defaults to Telegram_files. If you are using the same database, then use different collection name for each bot

CACHE_TIME.description: The maximum amount of time in seconds that the result of the inline query may be cached on the server
